transcript: as you level up people either come with you or they fall off they want you to behave a certain way and that behavior they're basically demanding from you and when you don't act that way they punish you verbally they avoid you they they send messages whatever it is right they passively aggressively make comments whatever it is either someone is helping me become the person that I want to become or they're hindering me and I just don't have room in my life for people who aren't helping me
